relproducts.title: Corsica Mauve - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The light mauve and apple green of the corsica mauve are a summer dream come true, with a pretty pattern of florals and foliage interwoven with each other across a soft white canvas. The look will work as part of either a contemporary or traditional dcor scheme. Use the mauve to add some gentle colour to your bathroom, where it will look stunning against a white bathroom suite and tiling. Accent with towels and accessories in matching greens and lilacs.

relproducts.title: Corsica Gold - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over. Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room. Surround with greys and similar shades of yellow for a coordinated look, opting for silver fittings and fixtures, and perhaps the occasional ornament or oddment.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
